document_data.name: ''Headband of the Binder''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''headband of the Binder''''' was a magic item created by [[bards]] It was also referred to as a '''''headband of the lorebinder'''''.
document_data.Description: This item was a metal circlet of blue-green hue with the symbol of Oghma, a blank scroll, embossed on the front.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of a ''headband of the Binder'' was able to ''[[read magic]]'' three times a day. This item was created by bards, and if the wearer was a bard, it also greatly increased the retention and recall of bardic knowledge. It also did the same for [[loremaster]]s and the lore they studied.
